CustomField.description: If the Download Date is greater than the Privacy Status Date OR if the Download Date falls within the last 365 days of the Privacy Status Date.
CustomField.formula: OR( Download_Date__c > Registrant__r.Privacy_Status_Date__c, AND( 0 <= (Registrant__r.Privacy_Status_Date__c - Download_Date__c), (Registrant__r.Privacy_Status_Date__c - Download_Date__c) <= 365 ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If the Download Date is greater than the Privacy Status Date OR if the Download Date falls within the last 365 days of the Privacy Status Date.
CustomField.label: Privacy Status Evaluation Period
